responses.Big Footprint: Nope, not my size. %NPC would be more likely.
responses.Small Footprint: These would be sufficient for me I guess. Or %NPC.
responses.Glasses: Glasses? Why would I need glasses!
responses.Bag: What do you think I would need a bag for? Try %NPC.
responses.Lipstick: Yes I'm wearing lipstick, %NPC gave it to me.
responses.Right Handed: What kind of question is that? I'm right-handed, but so is %NPC.
responses.Dark Hair: Oh behind this blue wig, my hair is dark. So is %NPC's, though.
responses.Erotic Novel: Of course not! That's more %NPC's thing.
responses.Broken Mobile Phone: You think I'm clumsy? How dare you! %NPC is the clumsy one!
responses.Car Keys: Those keys can't be mine! %NPC has that make of car though.

motives.Colin: He was a danger to everyone! You're welcome.
motives.Lily: She was so bouncy. I just had to bounce her right off the building.
motives.Mary: She scraped my car in the car park.
motives.Will: After some reflection, I could project no bright lights in his future. It was worth it to satisfy my evil blood-lust.
